column4: I've just found a directory /.Trash-root. du reports it eats up 6GB of space... can I delete it?
sure.  its basically the trash bin for the root account.
but the curious thing is, how come it's so big.. it contans folders like bin, bin (copy), usr, usr (copy)... it seems that entire tree got copied to this trash two times!
but thanks for the answer i'll delete it right away
